grantors.title: Grantors
grantors.description: The grantors definition is used for the 'borrowers' array within 'borrowerInformation' and the nonBorrowerOwners array, as those two arrays have identical properties.

trustVestingName.title: Full Trust Name -- include name of trustee(s) and their title(s).

formationState.title: State of Formation
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

isPowerOfAttorney.title: Is Grantor using a Power of Attorney to Sign?

attorneyInFact.title: Attorney-in-Fact
attorneyInFact.description: Only used if entityType == 'individual' && isPowerOfAttorney == true

isTranslator.title: Does this Grantor require a translator?

complexSigners.title: Signers for Grantor (complex)
complexSigners.description: The signers for this Grantor. Only needed if entityType != 'individual'

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

isTranslator.title: Translator Required?
isTranslator.description: Only used if entityType == 'individual' for this particular complex signer.

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

isTranslator.title: Translator Required?
isTranslator.description: Only needed if entityType == 'individual' for this signer.

signers.title: Signers for Signers for Signers for Grantor
signers.description: At this third level of nesting, we assume that the following signers are individuals.

transactionID.title: Transaction ID
transactionID.description: OPTIONAL. You can use this key to send an ID to identify this transaction within your system. The user never sees it in the interview and IT DOES NOT AFFECT THE DOCUMENTS IN ANY WAY. If a value is sent it will be included with the transaction information you receive for billing.

isTestFile.title: Is this a test file?
isTestFile.description: Makes the file a test file. Test files are not billed by Lightning Docs. Using this feature for real transactions is a violation of the Lightning Docs license agreement.

disableFeatures.description: NOT YET AVAILABLE. This object contains properties that allow you to disable the user's control over loan features that are normally viewable by the user. It does NOT control whether or not a given loan feature is actually on or off for the transaction. Only use this section to turn off access to loan features-making them unavailable when a user views the interview-by making the appropriate value 'true' (this is only useful if you expect your users to view the interview; there's no reason to turn off permissions to features you simply don't intend to use).

disableGoverningLaw.title: Governing Law State and Lender's County for Arbitration

enableFeatures.description: This object contains properties that allow you to enable features normally not viewable by the user. It does NOT, on its own, control whether or not a given loan feature is actually on or off for the transaction. The following loan features are UNAVAILABLE by default. Make features available to the user by making the appropriate value 'true'. (It is best practice to enable visibility for any features to be used in a given transaction). Generally speaking these features should only be enabled after consultation with Geraci LLP legal counsel.

enableBorrowerServicingFees.title: Borrower Responsible for all Servicing Fees

enableDeferredBrokerFees.title: Enable the option to Defer a Broker Fee

enablePropertyManagement.title: Enable Assignment of Property Management Agreement?

enableUCC.title: Enable Access to UCCs (Equity Pledges and Collateral Security Agreements)

enableTranslator.title: Enable Translator Certificate for Non-English Speaking Borrowers?

enableSPE.title: Enable Borrower to be a Special Purpose Entity?

enableNoFillCertNonOwner.title: Enable No-Fill Certification of Non-Owner Occupancy

enableNoFillBusinessPurpose.title: Enable No-Fill Business Purpose Loan Certification

enableRemoveLanguageCapacity.title: Enable removal of English Language Capacity Declaration

enableRemoveInitials.title: Enable the removal of initial lines in the footer of documents

enableDSCR.title: Include a Debt Service Coverage Ratio Requirement and Event of Default

enableScheduleOfProperties.title: Enable attaching a list of properties instead of manually entering properties

enableSignerWarning.title: Enable including a coverpage for all documents that require initials or completion?

enableRemoveCertificates.title: Enable removal of all Entity Certificates?

enableRemoveTitlePolicy.title: Enable removal of title insurance policy?

enableFirstPaymentLetter.title: Enable adding a First Payment Letter?

enableDeferredOriginationFees.title: Enable the option to defer an Origination Fee

enableEntityOwnership.title: Enter Owners (Members/Shareholders) of Entity Borrowers & Guarantors?

enableReviewChecklistDoc.title: Automatically Produce a 'QC Review Checklist' document

enableBorrowerCertification.title: Enable adding Borrower Release of Data Form

enableLegalDescription.title: Manually Enter the Legal Description of the Property

enableCollateralAssignment.title: Enable Modification to Loan Assignment to Collateral Assignment of Loan

enableInterestCalcType.title: User can Change Interest Calculation Type between 30/360 - Actual/360 and Actual/365

enableWorkItemName.title: Allow for custom work item names?

enableProFormaPolicy.title: Enable Attaching Pro Forma Exhibit Instead?

deliveryTo.title: Borrower delivery to
deliveryTo.description: Person who will take delivery on Borrower's behalf ('Attn'). Only needed when borrowerInformation.noticeTo == 'Other'.

isAnyBorrowerIRA.title: Is any Borrower an IRA or 401k?

nonBorrowerOwners.title: Add Non-Borrower Property Owners // Non-Borrowers
nonBorrowerOwners.description: The Non-Borrower Property Owners are parties who have an ownership interest in property to be pledged but who are not Borrowers on the loan. Use of this schema should be combined with enableFeatures.enableGrantors == true

isGuaranty.title: Include a Guaranty?
isGuaranty.description: This must be true to produce guaranties.

formationState.title: State of Formation
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

isPowerOfAttorney.title: Is Guarantor using a Power of Attorney to Sign?

AttorneyInFact.title: Attorney-in-Fact
AttorneyInFact.description: Only needed if entityType == 'individual' && isPowerOfAttorney == true

isTranslator.title: Does this Guarantor require a translator

spousalSignature.title: If Guarantor is married, does Guarantor or Guarantorâ€™s spouse reside in Alaska, Arizona, Idaho, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Texas, Washington, or Wisconsin?
spousalSignature.description: Only needed if entityType == 'individual'. Note that some users choose to expand the list of states. The Default is 'true' if the guarantor is an individual.

complexSigners.title: Signers for Guarantor (complex)
complexSigners.description: The signers for this Grantor. Only needed if entityType != 'individual'

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

signers.title: Signers for Signers for Signers for Guarantor

isExhibitA.title: Lender's named in Exhibit A?
isExhibitA.description: If this is true, no additional information is needed about the Lender(s) within this section EXCEPT for the properties that begin 'notice'.

isMultipleLenders.title: Are there multiple lenders?
isMultipleLenders.description: If this is true, the 'name' and 'cflNumber' properties below can be ignored. Instead, such information is entered into the same properties within the 'lenders' array. NOT needed if isExhibitA == true.

name.title: Enter Lender Name
name.description: NOT needed if isExhibitA == true || isMultipleLenders == true.

entityType.title: Entity type
entityType.description: NOT needed if isExhibitA == true || isMultipleLenders == true.

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'. NOT needed if isExhibitA == true || isMultipleLenders == true.

isCFLNumber.title: Do any of the Lenders have a California CFL License?

cflNumber.title: Is the Lender a California lender with a CFL License number

noticeTo.title: Will notice be sent to the Lender or a Third Party on behalf of the Lender?

lenders.title: Enter lenders
lenders.description: Not used if isExhibitA == true. Only needed if isMultipleLenders == true.

formationState.title: Organization state
formationState.description: The state of formation for certain kinds of entities. Only needed if entityType != 'individual' && entityType != 'trust'

cflNumber.title: CFL License Number (if any)
cflNumber.description: Optional, but only used if lenderInformation.isCFLNumber == true.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: This is the amount of each Lender's contribution to the total loan amount. The sum of all Lenders' contributions becomes the loan amount when there are multiple lenders, in which case loan.amount is therefore ignored.

isRemoveACH.title: Remove the standard ACH from the document set? (This will remove the ACH itself, but all references to it will remain.)

isBroker.title: Is a Broker used on this transaction?

isRemoveTitleInsurance.title: Remove Title Insurance Policy?
isRemoveTitleInsurance.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableRemoveTitlePolicy == true

name.title: Title Company Name
name.description: When isRemoveTitleInsurance == true, the title for this property will change to Closing Agent Company Name

contact.title: Title Officer Contact Name
contact.description: When isRemoveTitleInsurance == true, the title for this property will change to Closing Agent Officer Contact Name

email.title: Title Officer Contact Email
email.description: When isRemoveTitleInsurance == true, the title for this property will change to Closing Agent Officer Contact Email

address.title: Title Company Address
address.description: Optional. When isRemoveTitleInsurance == true, the title for this property will change to Closing Agent Company Address

isSingleTitleReport.title: All Properties on Single Title Report?

isReduceCoverage.title: Reduce Title Insurance Coverage Amount from 125% to 100% of Loan Amount? (125% if 'No')

exceptionItems.title: Exception Items to be deleted by title

altaEndorsements.title: Additional ALTA Endorsements Requested by Lender

isScheduleOfProperties.title: Use Schedule of Properties?
isScheduleOfProperties.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableScheduleOfProperties == true

isPartialRelease.title: Allow for partial release of collateral?

legalDescription.title: Legal Description
legalDescription.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableLegalDescription == true

isFixtureFiling.title: Include Fixture Filing with each Security Instrument?

propertyID.title: Property Tax ID Number (APN)
propertyID.description: The Property Tax ID Number for the collateral property (also called the 'APN'). This is REQUIRED for each property submitted, even if the user intends to send partial data and complete the remainder of the form by hand.

lienPosition.title: Lien Position
lienPosition.description: This property is converted to a string within the interview, but the API requires it to be sent as an integer, then converts it to a string.

propertyType.title: Property Type
propertyType.description: Only needed if the collateral property is in the state of Maryland, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, or Kentucky. (Some users have client-specific provisions that require it regardless of property state.) The 'Residential' option selects '1-6 Single Family Resident' in New York, and '1-4 Single Family Residence' in every other state. The 'Multi-Family' option selects '7+ Multi-Family Property' in New York, and '5+ Multi-Family Property' in every other state.

rentalProperty.title: Is this a residential rental property?
rentalProperty.description: Only needed if state == 'Utah' While this property looks like it should be a boolean, it is set up as a string to prevent the system from automatically concluding that the collateral property IS NOT a rental property when no answer is provided. That would cause incorrect information to be entered into the security instrument.

isLeaseholdMortgage.title: Is Borrower leasing the Property instead of a Fee Ownership?

leaseholdLessor.title: List Parties Defined as Ground Lessor
leaseholdLessor.description: Finishes the definition ''Ground Lessor' means ____________, its successors and/or assigns.'

isHomestead.title: Is the Property the Borrower's primary residence?

usesScheduleOfProperties.title: Uses Schedule of Properties
usesScheduleOfProperties.description: This property is ignored by the interpreter. It can optionally be sent as 'true' to prompt validation functions using the final validation schema to check that the correct information was sent for each collateral property. (Less information is needed for each repetition of 'collateralProperties' when usesScheduleOfProperties == true)

releasePrice.title: Minimum Release Price
releasePrice.description: Only needed if collateral.isPartialRelease == true && collateral.partialRelease == 'Release Price'

allocatedLoanAmount.title: Allocated Loan Amount ($)
allocatedLoanAmount.description: CLIENT SPECIFIC. Used for some forms of Partial Release when collateral.isPartialRelease == true && collateral.partialRelease == 'Release Price'

isPurchaseMoney.title: Is this a purchase money loan?

trustee.title: Choose Trustee of the Deed of Trust
trustee.description: When using the API, the 'Trustee Name' dropdown on the Lightning Docs 'Property Information' form is always set to 'Other.' The name you give here answers the attendant text field. Only needed when the collateral property is in one of the following states: Arizona, Alaska, California, Colorado, District of Columbia, Idaho, Maryland, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, North Carolina, Nevada, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Washington and West Virginia.

trusteeName.title: Trustee Name
trusteeName.description: Only needed when 'Other' was selected for trustee.

trusteeAddress.title: Trustee Address
trusteeAddress.description: Trustee's Street, City, State, and Zip. Only needed when 'Other' was selected for trustee and the collateral property is in one of the following states: Arizona, Mississippi, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia, and West Virginia.

trusteeCounty.title: Trustee County
trusteeCounty.description: Only needed when the collateral property is in Tennessee.

owner.title: Owner Name
owner.description: The owner's name exactly as it appears in the borrowers (or nonBorrowerOwners) array. No two borrowers should have the same name.

vesting.title: Vested As
vesting.description: How the owner is vested, eg, 'a single man' or 'a married woman as her sole and separate property'. See lightningdocs for other examples, but the text can be anything; it need not be among the options given in lightningdocs. IMPORTANT: answer 'married' (without the quotes) for the FIRST of two married individuals vested together, then give the actual vesting for the second of the two. This will combine them together for vesting.

seniorLiens.title: Request for Notice of Default of Senior Liens
seniorLiens.description: Information about senior liens used in the security instrument's Request for Notice of Default of Senior Lien. Only needed if lienPosition > 1 && (state == 'California' || state == 'Nebraska')

product.title: Loan Type
product.description: Optional. Some users have client-specific language in the documents that varies depending on the type of loan (e.g., 'Bridge' or 'Rental'). That loan type or product name can be submitted to this property. While users filling the online form would see a dropdown list of choices to select from, those choices vary from user to user so they cannot be provided here.

isProxy.title: Do you want to build the loan documents using another company's customizations?
isProxy.description: CLIENT SPECIFIC. Optional. Under some circumstances, some users choose to have a transaction assemble using the special customizations of a different Lightning Docs user.

proxyUser.title: Select a company
proxyUser.description: Needed if isProxy == true. Allows you to identify the specific company whose customizations will be used for this transaction. The options are specific to each Lightning Docs user, so they cannot be given here.

clientName.title: Client Name
clientName.description: THIS IS ONLY USED IN API INTEGRATION DEVELOPMENT AND TESTING. Allows you to replicate client-specific conditions outside that client's Lightning Docs catalog. Contact Lightning Docs if you need to know which name to use to simulate a particular client.

usesMultipleLenders.title: Uses Schedule of Properties
usesMultipleLenders.description: This property is ignored by the interpreter. It can optionally be sent as 'true' to prompt validation functions using the final validation schema to check whether 'amount' (below) needs to be required. This should be sent as true whenever lenderInformation.isMultipleLenders == true.

amortization.title: Amortization Period (in months)
amortization.description: Should be 0 (zero) when isInterestOnly == true && ( ioPeriod == term ).

isVariable.title: Variable Rate?
isVariable.description: Should not be used with isInterestStep.

variableFirstChange.title: Number of Months before First Payment Change Date

variableFirstCap.title: First Interest Cap Percent
variableFirstCap.description: Optional. Only used if isDailyRate == false.

variableSubsequentChange.title: Number of Months between Change Dates after First Payment Change Date

variableSubsequentCap.title: Subsequent Interest Cap Percentage
variableSubsequentCap.description: Optional. Only used if isDailyRate == false.

variableCeiling.title: Maximum Interest Percent Over Floor Rate

isInterestStep.title: Interest Rate Step
isInterestStep.description: Should not be used with isVariable.

firstPaymentDate.title: First Payment Date
firstPaymentDate.description: Optional. Used to override the automatic calculation of the First Payment Date.

maturityDate.title: Maturity Date
maturityDate.description: Optional. Used to override the automatic calculation of the Maturity Date.

isCreditLine.title: Is this a line of credit?

isRevolving.title: Can the borrower pay down principal and reborrow funds (i.e. revolving)?

maxDraws.title: Maximum Number of Draws per Month

isDeferredPayments.title: Defer Payments to Maturity?
isDeferredPayments.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableDeferredPayments == true

isCompoundingInterest.title: Add Deferred Payments to Principal (Negative Amortization / Compounding Interest)?

prepaymentPremium.title: Select Prepayment Premium
prepaymentPremium.description: Used if isPrepaymentPremium == true; Answers 'Yield Maintenance', '90-Day Step', and 'Minimum Interest' are only available to some users.

prepaymentLockoutAmount.title: Penalty Dollar Amount
prepaymentLockoutAmount.description: Only needed if prepaymentPremium == 'Lockout' && prepaymentLockoutCalculation == 'Dollar Amount'

isPrepaymentLockoutInterest.title: Borrower has to pay interest through penalty period in addition to penalty?

prepaymentTerm3.title: Number of Years
prepaymentTerm3.description: Only needed if prepaymentPremium == 'Non Linear Step'.

prepaymentSteps.title: Penalty Percentage (%)
prepaymentSteps.description: Only needed if prepaymentPremium == 'Non Linear Step'.

isPrepaymentMinimumPayment.title: Can borrower pay 20% in a year without triggering prepayment penalty?
isPrepaymentMinimumPayment.description: Only needed if prepaymentPremium is 'Guaranteed Interest', 'Linear Step', 'Lockout', or 'Non Linear Step'.

isBridgeToPerm.title: Bridge to Perm Loan?
isBridgeToPerm.description: Must be used in combination with loan.isInterestOnly == true.

isConstruction.title: Is Lender reserving funds for construction or rehab?

constructionType.title: Type of Construction Reserve Language to be used

isNonDutch.title: Does interest accrue on reserved construction funds only when they are advanced to the borrower? (non-dutch interest)

isFundsControlAgent.title: Will Lender use a third-party Funds Control Agent?

isAssignmentOfPermits.title: Include a Separate Recordable Assignment of Permits and Agreements?

isConstructionCompletionGuaranty.title: Include Third Party Construction Completion Guaranty?

constructionCompletionGuarantors.title: Give the Guarantor Name for each Construction Completion Guaranty

monthsPerExtension.title: Number of Months for Each Extension

feeAmount.title: Percent of Loan Balance/Amount of Extension Fee

isAutoExtension.title: Include Automatic Extension language in loan documents?
isAutoExtension.description: CLIENT SPECIFIC. Only used if isExtension == false.

deferredBrokerFee.title: Deferred Broker Fees?
deferredBrokerFee.description: Optional; sending no answer is functionally equivalent to answering 'None'.

deferredBrokerFeeAmount.title: Amount/Percentage of Loan Amount
deferredBrokerFeeAmount.description: Only used if deferredBrokerFee == 'Dollar Amount' || deferredBrokerFee == 'Percentage of Loan'.

deferredOriginationFee.title: Deferred Broker Fees?
deferredOriginationFee.description: Optional; sending no answer is functionally equivalent to answering 'None'.

deferredOriginationFeeAmount.title: Amount/Percentage of Loan Amount
deferredOriginationFeeAmount.description: Only used if deferredBrokerFee == 'Dollar Amount' || deferredBrokerFee == 'Percentage of Loan'.

isBorrowerServicingFees.title: Is Borrower Responsible for all Servicing Fees?

isDSCR.title: Include a Debt Service Coverage Ratio Requirement and Event of Default?

assignmentOfPermitsProperties.title: Select the properties for Assignments of Permits
assignmentOfPermitsProperties.description: Only needed if isCannabisLoan == true || construction.isAssignmentOfPermits == true. Give the Property ID (APN) of each collateral property for which you want an Assignment of Permits.

isSPE.title: Require Borrower to be a Special Purpose Entity?

lockboxDate.title: First Rent Sweep Date for Hard Lockbox
lockboxDate.description: Only needed if isLockbox == true && lockboxType == 'Hard'.

isImpounds.title: Are there any tax and/or insurance impounds?

interestReserve.title: Debt Service Reserve (Interest Reserve)?
interestReserve.description: Optional; sending no answer is functionally equivalent to answering 'None'.

interestReserveMinimum.title: Minimum Interest Reserve Balance
interestReserveMinimum.description: CLIENT SPECIFIC. Only needed if interestReserve == 'Dollar Amount' || interestReserve == 'Monthly Payments'.

defaultReserve.title: Default Reserve?
defaultReserve.description: Optional; sending no answer is functionally equivalent to answering 'None'.

perDiemDelivery.title: Per Diem Interest Payable and Delivered to

usesScheduleOfProperties.title: Uses Schedule of Properties
usesScheduleOfProperties.description: This property is ignored by the interpreter. It can optionally be sent as 'true' to prompt validation functions using the final validation schema to validate the correct properties within this object.

propertySelect.title: Select Property for this Assignment
propertySelect.description: Give the Property ID (APN) of the collateral property for which you want an Assignment of Property Management Agreement. Used when isScheduleOfProperties != true.

propertyAddress.title: Give Address for the Property for this Assignment
propertyAddress.description: Address for the collateral property for which this Assignment is to be made. Only used isScheduleOfProperties == true.

firstPaymentAmount.title: First Payment Amount (this includes any monthly impounds)

isUseFirstPayment.title: Use this amount (less monthly impounds, if any) wherever the initial payment amount appears?

isLoanSale.title: Is this loan intended for sale?

saleType.title: When will the loan be sold?

assignee.title: Select the loan purchaser or select 'Other' to enter the loan purchaser name(s) and address manually, or leave blank and a blank Assignment and Allonge will be produced.
assignee.description: Possible answers vary by user. Check the relevant question on the Lightning Docs form for options, or contact Lightning Docs support. 'Other' may be used to give an assignee name and address using the properties below.

isCollateralAssignment.title: Change Assignment of Loan to a Collateral Assignment of Loan?

collateralDate.title: Assignee Loan Documents Date
collateralDate.description: Only used if saleType == 'Concurrent' && isCollateralAssignment == true.

isAssignmentResale.title: Include additional Assignment and Allonge for future assignment by Assignee?

isLoanSubordination.title: Produce Loan Subordination Agreement / Intercreditor Agreement?

usesScheduleOfProperties.title: Uses Schedule of Properties
usesScheduleOfProperties.description: This property is ignored by the interpreter. It can optionally be sent as 'true' to prompt validation functions using the final validation schema to validate the correct properties within this object.

propertySelect.title: Select Property for this Loan Subordination
propertySelect.description: Give the Property ID (APN) of the collateral property for which you want a Loan Subordination and Intercreditor Agreement. Used when isScheduleOfProperties != true.

propertyAddress.title: Give Address for the Property for this Loan Subordination
propertyAddress.description: Address for the collateral property for which this Loan Subordination is to be made. Only used if isScheduleOfProperties == true.

investedAmount.title: Invested Amount
investedAmount.description: The sum of this amount over all Subordinate Lenders should equal debtAmount.

isAKA.title: Do any individuals require Signature Affidavit and AKA Statement?

akaInformation.title: Enter all individuals who require an AKA

name.title: Select Individual [Give the name for whom the Signature Affidavit is to be made]

isBorrowerCertification.title: Include Borrower Release of Data Form?

isRemoveArbitration.title: Remove Arbitration Provisions?
isRemoveArbitration.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableRemoveArbitration == true

isRemoveLanguageCapacity.title: Remove English Language Capacity Declaration?
isRemoveLanguageCapacity.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableRemoveLanguageCapacity == true

isRemoveInitialLines.title: Remove initial lines from document footers?
isRemoveInitialLines.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableRemoveInitials == true

isRemoveEntityCertificates.title: Remove All Entity Certificates?
isRemoveEntityCertificates.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableRemoveCertificates == true

isIncludeCoverpage.title: Include Coverpage for documents that require initials or completion?
isIncludeCoverpage.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableSignerWarning == true

isIncludeMasterGuaranty.title: Include Reference to a Master Guaranty (see ?)

isNoFillNonOwnerOccupancy.title: Use no-fill Certification of Non-Owner Occupancy?
isNoFillNonOwnerOccupancy.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableNoFill == true

isNoFillBusinessPurpose.title: Use no-fill Business Purpose of Loan Certification?
isNoFillBusinessPurpose.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableNoFill == true

isCSA.title: Create Collateral Security Agreement(s)?
isCSA.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableUCC == true

debtorSigner.title: Enter Name(s) and Title(s) of Parties Who Sign on behalf of the Entity being pledged

collateralType.title: Type of UCC Filing
collateralType.description: Select: 'blanket' for a Blanket UCC filing, 'other' to enter a list of specific personal property, 'both' to do both of the above, and 'custom' to attach a custom list or exhibit to the UCC filing.

personalProperty.title: Enter Specific Personal Property
personalProperty.description: Only needed if collateralType == 'other' or collateralType == 'both'.

isAdditionalUCC.title: Record additional UCC in Property Records?

additionalUCC.title: Identify which properties to record an additional UCC against

isEPA.title: Create Equity Pledge Agreement(s)?
isEPA.description: Use of this property should be combined with enableFeatures.enableUCC == true

signers.title: Enter Name(s) and Title(s) of Parties Who Sign on behalf of the Entity being pledged

owners.title: Enter Owners (Members, Shareholders or Limited Partners) of Entity Being Pledged

isAcknowledgeComplianceWarnings.title: I (i) acknowledge and understand the impact of each of the notices above, (ii) have taken all actions necessary to ensure that your loan and its terms are compliant, and (iii) would like to proceed with the loan terms as indicated in this interview.
